thread.title: Internet Business, Tropical Plants Nursery

title: Internet Business, Tropical Plants Nursery
text: Questions Business Summary Internet Business with ability to start retail outlet. Primarily a Plumeria nursery with over 600 Plumeria varieties (the largest collection of Plumeria/frangipani). Gorgeous blooming trees. This is the hawaiian lei flower. With over 600 varieties, each bloom and fragrance is unique and beautiful. fragrances from Jasmine, to Peaches, to Lemon, Gardenia. Our website offered wholesale and retail sales of plumeria and other tropical plants. Our business started as a hobby in 2000 and grew into profitable web-based business getting over 60,000 hits per month. This would be a great business for a retired couple or a nursery wanting to expand. Would make a fabulous addition to someone with acreage wanting to transform it into a tropical oasis. The plants are located in Naples, Florida and occupy about an acre of land. Financials are from last 12 months in business 2010. Nursery plants inventory $100,000 + Asking Price $100,000 Website is inactive. Looking to sell all plant inventory. Any reasonable offer considered. This is 20 Agricultural Truck loads of plants from 20 foot trees to gallon size. Over 1000 plumeria trees. Contact 239 963 7990 for more information on this Tropical Plants Nursery for sale. Financials
